alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 10 at 4:28AM PST until March 10 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Beaches, San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast and Southern Salinas Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Southern Salinas Valley
